title: Hallam Amos finds his voice for Wales as Warren Gatland tells fresh faces to shout their quarter-final claims
text:
Located safely away from the destruction created by Typhoon Hagibis, Wales still have a job to do on Sunday to ensure top spot in Pool D does not slip out of their hands at the last moment, an outcome which would leave them facing a quarter-final against England.

Warren Gatland has heavily shuffled his side to face Uruguay, with 13 changes and a new captain in Justin Tipuric, as five of the 31-man squad make their first appearances of the tournament.

One of that quintet is Hallam Amos, the Dragons back training to be a doctor who hopes that his days as a patient under the scalpel are behind him. Although he may end up using one regularly himself, given his plans to become a surgeon.

Having...
description: Located safely away from the destruction created by Typhoon Hagibis, Wales still have a job to do on Sunday to ensure top spot in Pool D does not slip out of their hands at the last moment, an outcome which would leave them facing a quarter-final against England.
